description: This file is a web-based user interface for visualizing databases and their tables. It includes HTML structure, CSS styles, and JavaScript for dynamic data fetching and interaction, primarily serving as a frontend component for database visualization.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets selections, and updates the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list and loads tables upon selection.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders an HTML table with fetched data and manages wide content issues.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.
